title: Australian Army at war
brief_description: A film telling the story of the Australian Army’s part in the fighting on world battle fronts, from the outbreak of war in 1939 until the surrender of Japan. It depicts the background of the Australian soldier, recruiting and training, embarkation scenes, a coverage of major campaigns, surrender ceremonies, release of prisoners of war and demobilization. No other credits available.
